attrs.name: percentage
attrs.desc: Percentage (mandatory) The optional values for this property are 0 - 100
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Progress bar type; The value of this attribute can be line, circle, or dashboard
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is line.

attrs.name: stroke-width
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 6

attrs.name: text-inside
attrs.desc: The text displayed on the progress bar is embedded in the progress bar. This parameter is available only when type is set to line.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: status
attrs.desc: Current status of the progress bar; The value of this attribute can be success, exception, or warning

attrs.name: color
attrs.desc: Background color of the progress bar (overwrites the status color).

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Circular progress bar canvas width (available only when type is circle or dashboard)
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 126.

attrs.name: show-text
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: format
attrs.desc: Customize the text of the progress bar
